Posts.Content: Why should the brand make any difference at all? The chemical structure of the drug will be exactly the same surely? Is there an implication that the coatings cause side effects because i would find that hard to believe?
Posts.Title: Letrozole..... Femara brand

Posts.Content: I am suffering sleepless nights and really strugling. I am up 5 times a night to use the loo. My ankles get swollen during the day and I do walk and excercise. My GP has been no help at all just sent me for blood tests where everything was normal.
Posts.Title: Water retention and letrozole
